labels.analysis: The Tavily MCP Server is primarily focused on web search, data extraction, and web crawling capabilities. Its tools enable real-time information gathering, content analysis, and website structure mapping, catering to research, data collection, and site auditing needs.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality revolves around searching, extracting, and analyzing web content, which aligns with the "Web Search & Research" category. Additionally, the server's tools can be used for automated browsing and data processing, justifying secondary labels in those areas.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Tavily MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @tavily-ai/tavily-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable real-time web search and data extraction capabilities.

tools.name: tavily-search
tools.description: Deploy Server Tavily MCP Server @tavily-ai/tavily-mcp Try in Playground tavily-search

tools.name: tavily-extract
tools.description: A powerful web content extraction tool that retrieves and processes raw content from specified URLs, ideal for data collection, content analysis, and research tasks.

tools.name: tavily-crawl
tools.description: A powerful web crawler that initiates a structured web crawl starting from a specified base URL. The crawler expands from that point like a tree, following internal links across pages. You can control how deep and wide it goes, and guide it to focus on specific sections of the site.

tools.name: tavily-map
tools.description: A powerful web mapping tool that creates a structured map of website URLs, allowing you to discover and analyze site structure, content organization, and navigation paths. Perfect for site audits, content discovery, and understanding website architecture.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@tavily-ai/tavily-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: tavilyApiKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: The API key for the Tavily MCP server.
